name: Andrew Fellman
text:
Seriously - if you haven't been to the Mellow Mushroom yet, what are you doing with yourself??
The pizza is truly of a higher order (see attached pictures), and Dominique, my ‚Ä¶More

name: James
text: Middle of the road pizza joint. I paid almost $50 for 2 pies. To be honest, I don't know if the price was backed up by the quality of pizza. It was good, but there are plenty of other places to go to get a similar quality of pizza for much ‚Ä¶More

name: E Barlup
text: Wow!  üòäüëçso we are visiting here from pa!  Just wanna say we had the most incredible tempeh sub topped with vegan " follow your heart" cheese! Fresh bun and fresh delicious veggies... Soooo so soooo good! Wish there was one of these in pa! ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Melvin
text: This place is amazing! Menu is fantastic and as a parent of a child with a dairy allergy, it's so wonderful to be able to treat the ENTIRE family to pizza. Whether you are looking for an AMAZING vegan pie or you are a big meat eater, this ‚Ä¶More

name: Haras Shirley
text: Mellow Mushroom is hands down one of my favorite places to get pizza. The Holy Shitake Mushroom pizza is perfect in every way. ‚Ä¶More

name: Em
text: I am SO EXCITED to have a pizza I can eat! I'm gluten and dairy free and resigned myself to no more pizza back when I changed my diet to support my health. But here I can order a pizza with gluten free crust, vegan cheese, and spinach and ‚Ä¶More

name: Kasey Ricciardi
text: Great food, great experience. Slightly higher price, but worth it. Will go again.

name: Neal Hoffman
text: I wanted to try a new pizza place and decided to check out Mellow.  We got the mighty meat and bbq chicken and they were both great.  Solid toppings and the crust was awesome.  We did curbside service and the pizzas were hot and in our car right when they said they would be.  I'll definitely be going here more often.

name: Mario Soriano
text: Amazing pizza its really good

name: Alison Burkhard
text: Excellent as always! We love Mellow Mushroom for the variety of choices, specialty pizzas, and pretzel nuggets with beer cheese. The service is fast and attentive, the food is delicious. The pizzas are big and loaded with fresh toppings. You can't go wrong choosing Mellow Mushroom!

name: R B
text: Went for the first time and had an amazing experience. Chill atmosphere, good beer selection, and good pizza. The number of topping options puts this place above the rest. Kady was my server and did a fantastic job for my table. Will definitely come back!

name: Matt Grove
text: I went to Mellow Mushroom to try vegan. Pizza. I had the vegetable. Pizza with vegan cheese. Waitress was very informative and told me all pizza crust at Mellow Mushroom is vegan. . Just have to tell them to make it vegan. So they don't put parmesan cheese on the crust. . It was excellent. . I would highly recommend it. .

name: David Reyburn
text: Good food with some good vegan pizza options

name: T Beauchamp
text: OMW!! THE BEST PIZZA EVER!! You can even get half and half, with two different sauces. The Holy Shiitake has a flavor that melts in your mouth and the Pacific Rim is a sweet and spicy mix with its ham, bacon, pineapple and jalapenos! A match made in heaven. A fun, yet relaxing atmosphere. We never pass a MM up!

name: Cheryl W
text: Excellent pizza, sandwiches & salad. Mushroom soup is glorious.

name: Dena Carson
text: The best pizza. Hands down.

name: Bradley Zachary
text: Great pizza, great selection of beers! They also have gluten free crust. Also, within walking distance is the international market... great place to look around.

name: Chris Bering
text: We always have a great time here! Good food, good beverages, good people. The staff are always friendly and helpful.

name: Sarah Wehmeier
text: Tastes like they beered down the beer cheese, very soupy and not a great taste, Broadripple brew wins on the beer cheese! Not bad for a gluten-free pizza, looks like the nasty cup of beer cheese was pressed down with a lot of love :( Boo MM, definitely not worth the $14 and some change, maybe $5!

name: Joe M.
text: Best pizza ever

name: David Scassa
text: Excellent pizza place

name: Benjamin Torres
text: Great place, great food, great beer selection

name: Still Shopping
text: Really disappointed with the way they handled our order. Placed the order over phone and waited. After a period of time, we asked if order was ready and they forgot to put it in!!!! We waited again. Our kids were waiting for us to pick them ‚Ä¶More

name: Neil Nelson
text:
1 star over a $2.49 cup of soda. That's how petty this is.

Called before ordering through Doordash if the soda was 2L. The lady asked me ‚Ä¶More

name: Fibr Carpet
text: Love thier pizza! Movie Wowie is my go to! Never a wrong choice here. Highly Recommended ‚ô°

name: amatelski26
text: You're doing your taste buds a major disservice if you don't come here. Amazing pizzas of a surprising variety, plenty of unique options, and good beer to boot!

name: Graham Meinert
text: Good pizza, good toppings. The gluten free crust is pretty unremarkable but that's not unique to Mellow Mushroom. If anyone has found a pizza place with a good gluten free crust, let me know. It's been 30 years since I've had a great pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Hicks
text: Best salad hands down!

name: Nat Carson
text: Food was great! I got a cheese calzone and added pepperoni. It was huge and delicious. I liked that the waitress didn't try to rush us out after we were all done eating.

name: Alex L
text: Unique items. The thai dye Pizza is the best! The only trade off is slow service and higher prices.

name: Joe Degenfelder
text: Pizza and calzones are great. Staff is usually friendly and attentive.

name: Jim Gandolf
text: My pizza was burnt on the bottom? Top was great, then to say, "I want the pizza done just right, and not burnt on the bottom!" I did get a 5 dollars discount, but really clean the "Mellow Mushroom's ovens" and you won't burn the bottom of ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Joubert
text: Love the pizza here!  High quality and great atmosphere!

name: Edward Gracia
text: Ordered a 14" pizza and waiter didn't ask for a crust preference. What we got was a thick crust very similar to Papa John's, only seasoned. Might go back and order a thin crust in the next couple of months. Not a priority.

name: Jack Huffman
text: Wonderful server Dominique made it amazing!

name: Gandolf Gustin Motorsports
text: The top of the pizza was perfect, the bottom was burnt. The reason was the oven wasn't scrubbed to get the doe remix was burnt so my bottom of my pizza was burnt, my daughter was up set. The waitress gave me a five dollars off the pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Henry Greene
text: Great food and usually great service.  Usually pretty loud.....not a good place for a quiet meal.

name: Matt Odell
text: Love this place.  Great lunch and daily drink specials.  Pizzas and salads are delicious.  Get mellow...

name: Dylan Doppler
text: Pizza was pretty solid

name: Jon Harrington

name: Olivia Mae G.
text: One of our fav pizza places! Always great service and great food.

name: R Myles
text: The pizza is good but both times I've been the service is horrible. Its a seat yourself, we waited approximately 3 mins before our waitor came an introduces themselves, then another 5+mins before she came to take our food order. Bad service great pizza call ahead way ahead

name: CraigPaul
text: Was first introduced to Mellow Mushroom in Atlanta Ga. I was pleased to see one open in Carmel Indiana. Best pizza and Calzones.

name: John Moyer
text: Interesting experience.  Fresh baked soft pretzels were good. Some of the pizza options are gluten free or vegetarian.  Many different pizza and toppings to choose from. The restaurant is clean, and we were seated right away.

text: Great pizza, friendly service.

name: Mark Robinson
text: So good, so good, so good. Love the variety of pizzas you can get. So different from other pizza places. You should definitely give it a go.

name: Katherine Allen

Thin crust holy shitake is awesome

text: Even when the restaurant wasn't very busy, we waited well over an hour for our food and service was lacking during that time. It was a struggle just to get refills and the tables were too small when the food finally did come. The food was OK but not worth the wait.
